tool.name: Split GFF3+Fasta into separate parts
tool.help:
**What it does**
Splits apart the GFF3 into separate files in a Galaxy Dataset Collection>
**Why**
This tool is useful when you have a workflow step which has produced a single GFF3 file containing a bunch of different analyses together. If displayed in JBrowse these would show up all mixed together.
This tool lets you define some uniqueness criteria, such as the record id. Everything with a given record id will be moved into a separate file.
This tool is useful in combination with the xmfa2gff3 tool which produces GFF3 that contains multiple records in a single file. By selecting "Record ID" and "Target", we will be able to separate into files like "A vs B" and "B vs A".
